title: n-th Prime
content: **nthPrime n** is the n-th prime (1-indexed). Uses Nat.nth to enumerate elements satisfying Nat.Prime.

title: Alternating Prime Term
content: **alternatingPrimeTerm n** = (-1)^n · n / p_n. The n-th term of the alternating series.

title: Partial Sums
content: **alternatingPrimePartialSum N** = Σ_{n=0}^N alternatingPrimeTerm(n). The N-th partial sum.

title: Convergence Definition
content: **AlternatingPrimeSeriesConverges**: The series converges if partial sums tend to a limit L.

title: Prime Number Theorem
content: **prime_number_theorem**: p_n / (n log n) → 1 as n → ∞. Fundamental result in analytic number theory.

title: Terms Tend to Zero
content: **terms_tend_to_zero**: n/p_n → 0 as n → ∞. Follows from PNT: n/p_n ~ 1/log n → 0.

title: Alternating Terms to Zero
content: **alternating_terms_to_zero**: |a_n| → 0. Necessary but not sufficient for alternating series convergence.

title: Not Monotone Decreasing
content: **not_monotone_decreasing**: n/p_n is NOT decreasing. Around twin primes, the ratio can increase (e.g., 5/11 < 6/13).

title: Hardy-Littlewood Conjecture
content: **HardyLittlewoodConjecture**: Predicts asymptotic counts for prime constellations. A deep unsolved conjecture.

title: Tao's Conditional Result (2023)
content: **tao_conditional_convergence**: Assuming Hardy-Littlewood, the series converges. The best known result.

title: Prime Gap
content: **primeGap n** = p_{n+1} - p_n. The gap between consecutive primes.

title: Erdős Gap Conjecture 2 (PROVED)
content: **ErdosGapConjecture2**: Σ(-1)^n/g_n diverges. Proved via Zhang's bounded gaps theorem.

title: Zhang's Bounded Gaps (2014)
content: **zhang_bounded_gaps**: Infinitely many prime gaps ≤ H for some H. Revolutionary breakthrough, later improved to H ≤ 246.

title: Gap Conjecture 2 is True
content: **erdos_gap_conjecture2_true**: Bounded gaps imply Σ(-1)^n/g_n has infinitely many large terms, so diverges.

title: Not Finitely Resolvable
content: **not_finitely_resolvable**: No finite computation can determine convergence. The tail behavior is unpredictable.

title: No Absolute Convergence
content: **no_absolute_convergence**: Σ n/p_n diverges since n/p_n ~ 1/log n and Σ 1/log n diverges.

title: Harmonic-Log Diverges
content: **harmonic_log_diverges**: Σ 1/log n diverges (faster than harmonic series).

title: Empirical Limit
content: **empirical_limit_around_minus_one**: Partial sums appear to oscillate around -1. Numerical evidence only, not a proof.
